articles.author: Trevor Hughes
articles.title: Police officers, guns, and community collide: How the Charlotte house shooting happened - USA TODAY
articles.description: The US Marshals task force shootout left four officers and the suspect dead. It also revealed the overlapping dilemmas of American life.
articles.content:
CHARLOTTE, North Carolina - Rissa Reign and her girlfriend were doing spring cleaning, door open to let the sun in and the dust out, when they heard gunshots.
This being East Charlotte, they didn't … [+10768 chars]

articles.title: Mysterious Laser Transmission Strikes Earth From 140 Million Miles Away - NDTV
articles.description: Earth has received a mysterious signal from deep space, American space agency NASA has revealed. The signal, which originated approximately 140 million miles away.
articles.content: Earth has received a mysterious signal from deep space, American space agency NASA has revealed. The signal, which originated approximately 140 million miles away, came from NASA's new spacecraft, "P… [+2379 chars]
